snippet: An airstrike killed Saeed al-Shihri, a top leader of Al Qaeda’s branch in Yemen along with six others traveling with him in one car on Monday, American and Yemeni officials said.
abstract: Airstrike kills Saeed al-Shihri, a top leader of Al Qaeda's branch in Yemen, along with six others traveling with him in the southern province of Hadramawt.
lead_paragraph: An airstrike killed Saeed al-Shihri, a top leader of Al Qaeda’s branch in Yemen along with six others traveling with him in one car on Monday, American and Yemeni officials said.

headline.main: Yemen: Airstrike Kills a Top Leader of Al Qaeda
